participant_1.background:
I don't dye my hair.
I am single and live with my dog, who is a great listener.
my family came from greece in the 1950s.
ferrari is my favorite car company.
I want a home in a quiet area where I can focus on my art.

participant_2.background:
I design and sew clothes to distract from the disappointment that is my family.
I'm not interested in marriage, and archery is my passion.
one of my favorite shows is face off on syfy.
I want a new home that is affordable and close to work so I can save money and keep my financial troubles a secret from my parents.
i read a lot.

content.text: Good! Just finished sewing a new dress for my upcoming event.
Oh fun! What kind of event?
A friend's wedding. It's an archery themed wedding!
Cool! I'm not really good with archery. I like to read and paint.
I love reading too! I'm reading a book about the history of archery.
That sounds interesting! I've been learning about archery from watching the show Face Off on Syfy.
I love that show! I've always wanted to try special effects makeup.
Me too! I think it's so cool.
Well, it's been nice talking to you. I should probably get going.
It was nice talking to you too! Have a good day!
